description:
this month we are heading to point defiance for some urban trails & howdy bagels!! we will meet at the outer loop trailhead near lot A and meander through all the park has to offer before heading over to howdy bagels post-run for some fuel & social hangs ðŸ¥¯

route options include 8 miles, 10 miles, and 14 miles, and all routes stay together for the first 7 miles or so ðŸ¥³

dogs on leash welcome! be cute and carpool! we will be coordinating carpools in the womxn run the herd slack channel. please come prepared with the downloaded offline maps (message us if you donâ€™t know how), layers for the cold & wet, and a first aid kit (we will have a few extra first aid kits to share)

*this is a no-drop run open to women, trans, and non-binary folx who are comfortable in a space that centers the experiences of women.
title: womxn run the herd: weekend edition
